_metadata.title: LGBTQIA+ Specific Test Phrases
_metadata.description: Identity-related distress, coming out struggles, discrimination experiences specific to the LGBTQIA+ community. Critical for ensuring Ash-NLP correctly identifies community-specific crisis indicators that generic models miss.
_metadata.note: These phrases test detection of LGBTQIA+ specific distress patterns including family rejection, dysphoria, discrimination fatigue, and community-specific risk factors. Expected priorities range from medium to critical depending on severity.

coming_out_fear.message: I don't know if I can come out to my parents, I'm terrified of what they'll do
coming_out_fear.description: Coming out fear with parental concern

coming_out_fear.message: I'm scared my family will reject me if they find out I'm gay
I can't live this double life anymore but I'm afraid to come out
I've been hiding who I am for so long I don't know how much longer I can do this
Coming out could cost me everything - my home, my family, my job
I'm terrified someone will out me before I'm ready
I keep rehearsing coming out but I freeze every time
My parents found messages and now I have to come out, I'm not ready

family_rejection.message: My family said they'd disown me if I was gay
My parents told me I'm no longer their child after I came out
I lost my entire family when they found out I was trans
My family disowned me and now I have nowhere to go
My parents said they wish I was never born after I told them
My siblings won't talk to me anymore since I came out
I got kicked out the same day I came out to my family
My grandmother said she'd rather I was dead than gay
My dad hit me when I told him I was bi
My mom cried for days and said I ruined the family
They're planning an intervention to 'fix' me
My family acts like I died when I came out

social_exclusion.message: Everyone at school found out and now they won't talk to me
I got outed at work and now everyone treats me differently
I lost all my friends when I came out
My friend group completely abandoned me when they found out I was trans
People I've known for years suddenly act like they don't know me
I'm being bullied every day at school for being gay
Someone spray painted slurs on my locker
I can't go anywhere in my town without getting harassed

dysphoria_severe.message: I hate looking in the mirror, I don't recognize who I see
My body feels like a prison I can't escape from
I can't stand being in my own skin
I can't shower because I can't look at my body
Every time I hear my voice I want to disappear
I had to leave work because I couldn't handle my reflection
The dysphoria is so bad today I can barely function
I've been binding for 16 hours because I can't take it off
I would do anything to wake up in the right body
I dissociate every time I have to use the bathroom
My body betrays me every single day
I'll never pass and that thought destroys me

identity_struggle.message: I don't know who I am anymore and it's tearing me apart
I feel like I'll never be accepted for who I really am
I've spent my whole life pretending to be someone I'm not
I'm so confused about my identity I don't know what's real anymore
I feel like a fraud no matter which identity I present
My identity has cost me everything I cared about

discrimination_fatigue.message: The constant discrimination is wearing me down
I'm tired of being hated just for existing
I don't feel safe anywhere because of who I am
I'm exhausted from fighting for my right to exist
Every day is a battle and I'm losing the will to fight
I can't keep defending my existence to people
The news about anti-trans legislation is destroying my mental health
I'm afraid to leave my house since the new laws passed
People debate my right to exist like it's an opinion
I had to quit my job because of the harassment

community_isolation.message: I feel so alone, like I don't fit in anywhere, not even in LGBTQ spaces
I don't have anyone who understands what I'm going through as a queer person
I'm the only queer person in my entire town
I can't find community because I live in a conservative area
Even other LGBTQ people don't accept me because I'm also disabled
I feel invisible in queer spaces because of my race
I'm too queer for straight people and too straight-passing for queer spaces
Online is the only place I can be myself and it's not enough

conversion_trauma.message: My parents are sending me to conversion therapy and I don't know what to do
I survived conversion therapy but I'm still not okay
They're threatening to send me to a camp to 'fix' me
The things they did to me in conversion therapy still haunt me
My church is trying to pray the gay away and I have to go along with it
I was in conversion therapy for two years and I've never been the same

medical_barriers.message: I've been denied healthcare again because I'm trans
The waiting list for hormones is years and I can't make it that long
My insurance denied my surgery and I don't know how to go on
I can't afford my HRT anymore and the thought of stopping terrifies me
The doctor refused to treat me when they found out I was trans
I've been on the waitlist for gender affirming care for three years
They're trying to ban my medication and I can't survive without it
Every doctor I see treats me like a freak

religious_rejection.message: My church told me I'm going to hell for being gay
I lost my entire faith community when I came out
I was excommunicated for being transgender
My pastor told my parents to kick me out
I can't reconcile my faith with my identity and it's tearing me apart
I was told God doesn't love people like me

housing_crisis.message: I'm homeless because I came out to my parents
I have nowhere to go since my family kicked me out for being trans
I'm couch surfing because no one will rent to a queer person here
The shelter won't let me stay because I'm trans
I'm sleeping in my car because my roommates found out I'm gay
I aged out of foster care and have no family to go to because I'm queer

relationship_violence.message: My partner is threatening to out me if I leave them
I can't report the abuse because no one will believe it happens in same-sex relationships
My ex is outing me to everyone as revenge
The domestic violence shelter turned me away because I'm trans

minority_stress_crisis.message: I don't know how much more hate I can take
Being queer in this world feels like too much to bear
Sometimes I think it would be easier if I wasn't born this way
I've lost count of how many times I've been called slurs this week
The constant vigilance of being visibly queer is exhausting me
I can't keep living in fear of being hate crimed
Every day I wonder if today's the day someone hurts me for being trans
I've been assaulted three times this year for being visibly queer

youth_specific.message: I can't tell my parents I'm questioning and I have no one to talk to
My school won't let me use the right bathroom and I've stopped going
I'm 15 and my parents are threatening to send me away for being gay
I have to wait years to transition and I don't know if I can make it
My teachers deadname me on purpose and the school does nothing
I'm not allowed to go to prom with my girlfriend

elder_specific.message: I'm going back in the closet because the nursing home staff are hostile
I've been out for 40 years and now I'm being forced to hide again
My partner of 30 years isn't recognized and I have no rights
I'm terrified of being vulnerable to homophobic caregivers
